title: Merge Hospital by Operate Now
description:
Prepare for an Extraordinary Medical Journey in Merge Hospital: The Doctor Game

Get E- MERGE -D in the story of Merge Hospital by Operate Now! In this doctor game you play as the merge tycoon: Dr. Player. You must match and merge items and manage the medical staff of the San Mori Hospital. By completing tasks you will earn money that you can use to build your hospital. 

You’re the new doctor in town! You will discover the many secrets of your staff members and discover what is happening in and around the hospital. In Merge Hospital by Operate Now you will merge and build, meet and love many highly skilled surgeons, doctors and other interesting characters. You will learn more about their stories and how they got into the hospital. What are you waiting for Doctor? Merge build now!

Can you help your medical staff by merging the items? Just like in real hospitals, there is never a dull moment in Merge Hospital by Operate Now. Merge items, match them together, complete tasks and earn money to spend on new medicine and upgrading the hospital. Your medical team is depending on you, Doctor! You will not only merge and match medical items for your medical team, but they also love pies and other food and dishes. So make sure to merge and build some delicious pies to keep them happy. In this free merge game you will merge 2 items to combine them into better versions, and remember, they not only love medicine, but they also love food!

As a new chief of the outpatient department you will find yourself in the San Mori Hospital where you meet with Nurse Sandy and discover the story of how you are connected. But you will also get to meet all the other surgeons, doctors and nurses in the hospital. 

Meet your medical team: 

👩🏽‍⚕️Nurse Sandy Haasan: a mysterious nurse who knows a lot about you. As the Head Nurse of the department she will help you find the right merge strategy. Discover the merge story about how you are connected.

👨🏿‍⚕️Paramedic Gary Walker: a mechanic that became a paramedic. He knows how to merge things and especially how to tune ambulances. He is in conflict with Matt who thinks Gary stole his job after the incident that happened. They are definitely no match! 

👨🏼‍⚕️Doctor John Ford: a relaxed, but arrogant- yet professional doctor that will be on your side from day one. Dr. John grew up in his parents' mansion with his little sister Rosita. He fears making mistakes as past events are forever hunting him.

🧑🏻‍⚕️Doctor Adam Fury: he may have failed as an artist, but e- merged as an highly skilled plastic surgeon. Dr. Fury merged two disciplines into one! He uses rather unorthodox procedures and only delivers masterpieces.

🥼Pharmacists Chris & Viktoria: get to know Chris Chow & Viktoria Vinoski and discover the events that are happening within the San Mori Hospital. 

In this Doctor Game your task is to find the right merge strategy. You’ll get to meet Dr. Pae, a highly skilled Neurosurgeon, Emilia from PR & George, the patient that never left. 

As the new chief of the outpatient department you will: 
MERGE and build medical items, pies and much more your medical staff needs.
MANAGE the hospital and improve the facilities in this merging game. 
MONITOR your medical staff and work alongside them.
DISCOVER the merge story of a medical drama like in your favorite medical shows.
EXPLORE the merge and story of the hospital and your medical team.
RELAX and enjoy a casual merge build game with interesting characters, dialogues, story and well crafted animated comics. 

Experience the thrill of a doctor game like never before in Merge Hospital: The Doctor Game. Download now and immerse yourself in a world of medical drama, strategic merging, and unforgettable characters!

Follow us on our socials
👍Facebook: @mergehospital
🤳Instagram: @mergehospital
✖ X(Twitter): https://twitter.com/MergeHospital

summary: Uncover secrets, merge and build, become a medical tycoon.
